author: Tatjana Titimova
description: Method: Firstly, infuse Tennessee whiskey with mint stems. STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
name: Meet Me At The Lynchburg Highway
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
